name: Baa Baa
description:
It's shearing time and the Black Sheep has lots of wool, but she wants to keep it! 

Run (endlessly) from the big mean shears and try to get as high of a score as you can.

CONTROLS

SPACE to Jump

F to toggle full screen (there's a bug so you have to hit it twice first time)

There's a few other key presses for debugging left active by accident so if you find them...congrats I guess!
